abstract: Felipe Lopez, former basketball star at St John's University who is working with city teenagers as ambassador for NBA Cares program, shares his typical Sunday routine.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lopez, a former St. John’s star and professional player who works with teenagers through N.B.A. Cares, attends Sunday services at his evangelical church and, later, at St. Patrick’s.

headline.main: For Felipe Lopez, a Basketball Ambassador, a Day to Pray
headline.print_headline: For a Basketball Ambassador, a Day to Pray

snippet: Mr. Lopez, a former St. John’s star and professional player who works with teenagers through N.B.A. Cares, attends Sunday services at his evangelical church and, later, at St. Patrick’s.
